      private void buildIsland(int islandId, List<Color> students, String owner, int numberOfTowers, int bancards)
      Make one island
      Parameters:
      islandId - the id of the island to make
      students - the students on the islands
      owner - the owner of the island
      numberOfTowers - the number of towers on the island
      bancards - the number of ban cards on the island
